ygData.subject: Combine Long Sword
ygData.msgSnippet: I got my first combine long sword last night.  The gypsies in Oasis wanted 56 plat and I only had 51, but the guy escorting me sold me his long sword for the
ygData.messageBody:
I got my first combine long sword last night. The gypsies in Oasis wanted
56 plat and I only had 51, but the guy escorting me sold me his long sword
for the cash I had. Woohoo ï¿½ death to Willowisps!!

Killed two willowisps in 15 mins and got one lightstone (worth 1 plat) and 2
gold!! This is a money making machine.

For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;

Patty of Halas
12th Rank Barbarian Warrior Princess
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
